message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its value to you, we propose a price of $11500. This is a special offer considering the high value this product holds for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. We appreciate your feedback and understand your perspective. To better align with your expectations while still reflecting the value of the product, we would like to counter with an offer of $10500. We hope this proposal works for you.
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $9800?

Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Bob. We're glad to hear that you're open to a compromise. Considering the value of the product and your interest, we would like to propose a price of $10200. We hope this offer meets your expectations.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $9500?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. We understand your financial constraints and are willing to make a final adjustment. We propose a price of $10000 for the product. We believe this offers a fair balance between the value of the product and your budget.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one last attempt at a compromise. How about we meet at $9200?

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. We're glad to see that we're closing in on a mutually beneficial agreement. Considering your latest offer and the value of the product, we propose a final price of $9800. We hope this offer works for you.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence. Unfortunately, I've reached my limit and can't go any higher. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree. I'm willing to meet at $9500, but that's as low as I can go. If you're willing to meet me there, I'll make the purchase. If not, I'll have to explore other options.
